---
title: "Blog"
---

```{r echo = FALSE, results = 'asis'}
post.path <- "_posts"
my.files <- list.files(path = post.path, pattern = ".*md$")
my.files <- sort(my.files, decreasing = TRUE)
for (f in my.files){
    f.path <- file.path(post.path, f)
    cat(readLines(f.path), sep = "\n")
    cat("\n")
}
```
